samples.instruction: Second-hand product-kku consumer rights apply aagumaa?
samples.current_output: Seller condition honestly disclose seyyanum. Hidden defects maraithu vitraal consumer rights apply aagum. 'As-is' condition-la vaanginaal limited rights. Dealer-idam vaanginaal full protection, private seller-idam vaanginaal limited.

samples.instruction: Chitta endraal enna? Patta-vida vithiyaasam enna?
samples.current_output: Patta = Owner details, survey number, area. Chitta = Same info + land classification (wet/dry), soil type, cultivation details. Chitta is more detailed. Agriculture land-kku Chitta mukkiyam. Both available at Taluk office or online.

Tamil Nadu-la agricultural land ceiling laws ullan. Farmer or farmer family member mathume wet land (15 acres limit) vaangalam. Dry land-kku liberal rules. Company/Non-farmer vaanga District Collector permission venum.

samples.instruction: Lawyer konjam expensive-aa irukku, free-yaa yaaraavadhu help pannuvaangalaa? (Rural Tamil)
samples.current_output: Free legal aid: DLSA (District Legal Services Authority) - income <Rs.3 lakh, women, SC/ST, disabled ellarkkum free lawyer. Toll-free: 15100. Taluk Legal Services Committee-lum apply pannalam. Court-la directly legal aid request pannalam.

Steps: 1) Written application to employer, 2) 30 days-kkul pay pannanum, 3) Refuse pannaal Controlling Authority (Labour Commissioner)-kku complaint, 4) Labour Court appeal. Delay-kku 10% interest kidaikkum. Forfeiture: Only if dismissed for serious misconduct.

samples.instruction: Property pillaigalukku transfer pannitten, ippo veliyethuraanga, enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Senior Citizens Act protection: Property transfer-kku piragu neglect/eviction = transfer cancel pannalam. Steps: 1) Tribunal application (Collector office), 2) Prove neglect/ill-treatment, 3) Order for property return. Time limit: None specified - apply anytime. Evidence: Witnesses, medical records (if abuse), communication records. Preventive: Transfer with life interest retention safer.

Locations: Taluk offices, e-Sevai centres, Common Service Centres. Online: eservices.tn.gov.in. Services: Certificates (income, community, nativity), Patta transfer, Pension, Ration card, License renewals. Fee: Rs.30-100 (service based).

Tamil Nadu-la: Stamp duty 7%, Registration fee 4% = Total 11% of property value (guideline value or sale value - edhu adhigamo adhu). Women single owner-kku stamp duty 1% concession. Agricultural land-kku lower rates.

Sattapadi 3-5 months-la mudiikkanum. Aanaal practical-aa 6 months - 2 years aagalam. Simple cases faster. Mediation option irundhaal 30-60 days-la settle aagalam. e-Filing cases faster-aa process aagum.

FIR = First Information Report - cognizable offence pattrina mudhal thagaval. Any police station-la podalam (Zero FIR). Written/oral complaint kodukkalam. Police written-aa ezhudhi ungal sign vaanguvaargal. Free copy kidaikkum. Online: tnpolice.gov.in.

Tamil Nadu-la rental agreement-kku oru varusha rent-oda 1% or Rs.20,000 - idhula edhu koraivo adhu stamp duty. Example: Monthly rent Rs.15,000 na, yearly rent Rs.1,80,000. 1% = Rs.1,800 stamp paper venum.

samples.instruction: Owner advance-la painting charge, cleaning charge kazhikkuraar - sariyaa?
samples.current_output: Normal wear and tear-kku tenant responsible illa. Paint fading, minor scratches idhukku kazhikka mudiyaadhu. But tenant potta holes, major damage-kku kazhikkalam. Move-in bodhu photos eduthu vaichirupathu nalladhu.
